data.text:
The world is facing a shortage of health workers, particularly nurses & midwives, which could impact efforts to achieve universal health coverage by 2030.

Thursday is #InternationalNursesDay: https://t.co/eoQrbUVOt0 via @WHO https://t.co/QxdmCX6uPN

"In our time – a time of conflicts, climate crisis & #COVID19 – there is simply no sustainable alternative to dialogue, international cooperation & global solutions."

In Vienna, Austria, @antonioguterres stresses the importance of multilateralism. https://t.co/iy0VNVM5eJ

$33 million pledged to prevent potential ecological & humanitarian disaster off coast of Yemen. 

UN says much more support needed to prevent catastrophic spill from ageing oil tanker, FSO Safer. https://t.co/rWlwyOyGuv

Every day, nurses around the 🌎 save lives.

Amid #COVID19, many risked their own wellbeing to care for others.

On Thursday's #InternationalNursesDay, join us in thanking them for improving people’s health, even in the most difficult of times. https://t.co/eoQrbUVOt0 via @WHO https://t.co/9Pb0OS42OC

Ukraine: An estimated 4.8 million jobs have been lost since the beginning of the war.

This number could soar to over 7 million if the conflict continues, warns @ilo.
https://t.co/dcq0EWYs6t

"Multilateralism is needed more than ever at this extraordinarily difficult & dangerous time."

-- @antonioguterres says to meet the many challenges facing the world today, the global community must raise its ambition & act together with greater urgency. https://t.co/gqbvd3Afq7 https://t.co/Z5iUDyOYUh

Attacks on journalists are attacks on freedom of expression. 

Now, more than ever, we need facts and press freedom. 

Defending journalism is standing up for democracy. 
https://t.co/fXyyqdnfv4 via @UNESCO https://t.co/g2Ne7fdk9X

Most of the world's forcibly displaced people are from countries that are taking the brunt of the climate emergency.

UNHCR works to address disaster-related displacement & supports refugees on the frontline of the climate crisis. https://t.co/Mm49a4Cc9P via @Refugees https://t.co/nEpj5gqkSX

Hate speech online can cause harm in real life. 

Say #NoToHate: 
💠 Make your social feeds a no hate zone.
💠 Check facts before sharing.
💠 Challenge hate by sharing messages of tolerance & equality. 
💠 Support those targeted by hate speech. 

https://t.co/rSpMcD0VFL https://t.co/bMJCrYZE9G

Every day, UN peacekeepers work to:
🇺🇳 Protect civilians
🇺🇳 Help achieve & maintain peace
🇺🇳 Defend human rights & much more

More on @UNPeacekeeping’s vital work ahead of #PKDay: https://t.co/gQ7NxQaWRC https://t.co/iHs4VS8XFp

Ukraine: @UNHumanRights team completes mission to country, warning that countless civilians remain caught up in horror & destruction of war. 

Investigators share of reports of torture, sexual violence, summary executions & other human rights violations. https://t.co/KiJJIxwOTY

“It is impossible to meet refugees and not be deeply moved by their stories.”

In Moldova, @antonioguterres visits a refugee centre & speaks with host families lending support & showing compassions for people fleeing the war in Ukraine. https://t.co/muiB7QlLHJ

The likelihood of the average global temperature reaching 1.5°C above pre-industrial levels is higher than ever & the risk is increasing with time, warns @WMO.

We need urgent & ambitious #ClimateAction now.

https://t.co/VbYYQOX6er°c-threshold https://t.co/ZzFUeXaJMN

UN General Assembly elects Czech Republic to fill vacant seat on Human Rights Council.

Last month, #UNGA suspended membership of Russia to the Council amid war in Ukraine. https://t.co/Vw8PCYYJEh https://t.co/NTiJlxIBXK

"We absolutely need to stop this war and to see international law prevail."

-- In Moldova, @antonioguterres commended the generosity of the country towards refugees from Ukraine & said UN is scaling up efforts to support humanitarian response. https://t.co/9rNntof3Ia

“We can either reap the benefits of land restoration now or continue on the disastrous path that has led us to the triple planetary crisis of climate, biodiversity & pollution”.

– @AminaJMohammed at UN conference on desertification #UNCCDCOP15. https://t.co/OfN02obB8h

The Argan tree and its landscapes contribute to:
🔸 food security
🔸 nutrition
🔸 income generation
🔸 the livelihoods of rural communities

More from @FAO on Tuesday's International Day of Argania: https://t.co/TeK9lrSqbM https://t.co/zjquRp0pCm

"The impact of the war in Ukraine across the region & the world is profound & far-reaching."

– @antonioguterres during solidarity visit to Moldova, as country opens its borders to half a million Ukrainian refugees. https://t.co/FooYjemFBc

Schools should be safe havens & places where children can learn & flourish.

Schools are #NotATarget.

In Ukraine, @UNICEF is on the ground, working to protect children & keep them learning. https://t.co/tHZkT0KNXf

 https://t.co/AcmMTe0NBY

Syria: 11 years of war has resulted in a humanitarian catastrophe, with nearly 15 million people depending on aid & 12+ million forced from their homes.

@UNOCHA works with partners to deliver life-saving assistance, but more funds are urgently needed. https://t.co/vcNvG6TH8L https://t.co/tgBevM1eeh

Increasing urbanisation & the climate crisis are affecting our cities.

We need to #ActNow to protect our urban communities! 🏙️

More from @FAO on how YOU can take #ClimateAction for more sustainable cities of the future. https://t.co/qqXpEP7PbH
 https://t.co/JZqiYbRhCV

Children should play.
Children should learn.
Children should be children.

Yet thousands of children are victims of #HumanTrafficking every year.

See how @UNODC is working to protect them: https://t.co/rr22DslTXt https://t.co/2CU0mNLLYn

Droughts, sand & dust storms and wildfires are having an increasingly devastating impact on our world.

Follow @UNCCD as world leaders, civil society & others gather in Abidjan, Côte d’Ivoire, to seek solutions to these challenges & more: https://t.co/hdX705qraw

#UNCCDCOP15 https://t.co/K0EpLwuiY2
Ukraine: @antonioguterres appalled by attack on school where people were sheltering from ongoing fighting. https://t.co/2uJ4x4cAeT

Civilians and civilian infrastructure are #NotATarget. 

They must be protected. 

At all times.

Everywhere. https://t.co/0HqHNChDvt

War is not the answer.

We need peace.

Peace for the world.

We need peace now. https://t.co/qHoYTqOf55

People in the Horn of Africa are suffering amid one of the most severe droughts the region has ever experienced.

More than 15 million people in Ethiopia, Kenya and Somalia are grappling with hunger & water shortages. https://t.co/o7THMAUFS2 via @UNOCHA https://t.co/tFn1ZDykEy

Every day -- including amid serious challenges posed by #COVID19, conflict & other crises -- mothers do the impossible: balancing childcare, work & other responsibilities.

🌹 As many mark #MothersDay on Sunday, join us in celebrating the strength & courage of mothers everywhere. https://t.co/QVOAFRQ46Y

Throwback to last November's UN Climate Conference #COP26, where Sir David Attenborough spoke about the need to #ActNow to protect our shared future.

Today, we wish Sir David a very happy birthday -- and thank him for his tireless commitment to #ClimateAction! https://t.co/BC0nPXf04U

Collective agreements between employers & workers' organizations help advance equality & foster inclusion.

They have also played a key role in mitigating the impact of #COVID19 on employment & earnings.

More from @ilo: https://t.co/ijCCY0tiyA https://t.co/kiBaMIM7Mg

Vaccines are safe & help prevent millions of deaths every year. Yet, a growing number of networks seek to undermine trust in vaccinations.

Learn how #VaccinesWork & help share verified information that saves lives: https://t.co/nS7cB8vprW https://t.co/uJD1QTHNWj
Join us in honouring those who lost their lives during the Second World War during this week's time of remembrance. https://t.co/qFYw0IJCuw #WWII https://t.co/GmDHdrgMdN

🚉 Using public transport
🚯 Reducing food waste
👚 Buying sustainable fashion

People around the world have already logged more than 6 million of their #ClimateAction activities.

Join the movement & #ActNow: https://t.co/TrmoKhXA2Y https://t.co/eUa1fq9cRv

During conflicts, the lack of obstetric care can have devastating consequences for expectant mothers. 

Join @UNFPA in calling attention to how crises affect pregnant women around the world.

#SafeBirth must always be a priority: https://t.co/u69ezJokoj https://t.co/1ycgq8Hztu

Racism, xenophobia & intolerance are problems prevalent in all societies. 

But YOU can take action to #FightRacism: 
📣 Speak up
⏱ Volunteer your time & skills to organizations addressing racism
💰 Donate

Get ideas about how YOU can help #FightRacism. https://t.co/cCd3JjLrsV https://t.co/YEUMzET5kz

"The war on Ukraine is senseless in its scope, ruthless in its dimensions & limitless in its potential for global harm.  

The cycle of death, destruction, dislocation & disruption must stop."

-- @antonioguterres to Security Council this week. https://t.co/zRYsWHBu2n https://t.co/VF7AoylNJZ

🔹 Consent of the parties
🔹 Impartiality
🔹 Non-use of force except in self-defence & for protecting civilians

These three principles guide the deployment of @UNPeacekeeping operations. https://t.co/KMKCrU5IdJ https://t.co/KLPxsS4RDm

Children are among the most vulnerable in times of conflict.

From Despair to Hope: Children Beyond Armed Conflict is a new exhibit that reflects on the complexity of the lives of children caught up in conflict & their hopes for the future. https://t.co/BTN1AOvlEr https://t.co/6rFDSMFPVk

"Today, for the first time, the Security Council spoke with one voice for peace in Ukraine."

-- @antonioguterres welcomes Security Council statement and says he will spare no effort to save lives, reduce suffering & find the path of peace. https://t.co/iwzup3ET0c

The war in Ukraine is having devastating impacts on children, including their mental health.

@UNICEF says vulnerable children need urgent psychosocial support, but above all else, they need peace - now. https://t.co/PtxFjskQPB

The war in Ukraine is inflicting immense human suffering & devastating communities. 

@UNDP is supporting vital elements of the emergency response aimed at preserving the provision of public services & ensuring economic stability. https://t.co/LoB83Wrmvr https://t.co/URT7d5tipK

A child's gender can have a profound impact on the risks they may face during times of conflict. 

@childreninwar says there needs to be greater awareness of these unique dynamics & tailored support for children before, during & after conflict. https://t.co/pFwCDz3z12

The war in Ukraine is having a disproportionate impact on women, many of whom are facing hardships when it comes their health, safety & food security.

@UN_Women says the humanitarian response to the war must address the unique needs of those most at risk. https://t.co/5cyF14WXk1

Nearly 15 million deaths globally were linked to #COVID19 by the end 2021, according to @WHO.

The figure includes those who died directly from the disease as well as people who died from the pandemic’s devastating impact on health systems & communities. https://t.co/NMt5h4xYJX

"The war on Ukraine is senseless in its scope, ruthless in its dimensions and limitless in its potential for global harm."

-- @antonioguterres tells Security Council it is time to unite and end the war. https://t.co/wCFBvBrJrO https://t.co/kwaUavu4sf

Nearly 500 civilians have been evacuated from Mariupol & surrounding communities in Ukraine. 

Some spent the last 2 months sheltering underground.

All have experienced devastating losses.

The UN is supporting survivors, including by providing psychological support. https://t.co/umCsEszbNm

"We must continue to do all we can to get people out of these hellscapes."

-- @antonioguterres says nearly 500 civilians trapped in & around Mariupol, Ukraine have been evacuated through two safe passage convoys & that every effort must be made to bring more people to safety. https://t.co/vM70qkS6XK

Midwives save lives by providing essential sexual & reproductive health services.

On Thursday's #DayoftheMidwife, @WHO calls for greater investments in midwifery to ensure access to maternal healthcare for all. https://t.co/eoQrbUVOt0 https://t.co/KIkAc3SnmH

The UN & @ICRC successfully evacuated civilians stranded in Mariupol & other communities in Ukraine.

300+ civilians are now receiving humanitarian assistance in Zaporizhzhia.

The UN will continue efforts to guarantee safe passage for civilians. 
https://t.co/nGhCsVm7n6

Hand washing is key to protect yourself & others from #COVID19 & many other diseases. Yet, over 2 billion people lack soap & water at home.

On Thursday's World #HandHygiene Day, help mobilize action for access to hand hygiene for all: https://t.co/F22dIkEHs1 https://t.co/OVXhpULRaV

Hand washing is key to protect yourself & others from #COVID19 & many other diseases. Yet, nearly 3 billion people lack soap & water at home.

On Thursday's World #HandHygiene Day, help mobilize action for access to hand hygiene for all: https://t.co/F22dIkEHs1 https://t.co/wIgmWEZ5PE

Midwives provide essential sexual, reproductive, maternal & newborn health services, even amid challenges posed by #COVID19, climate shocks, conflict & other crises.

On the #DayOfTheMidwife, join @UNFPA in thanking midwives around the 🌍. https://t.co/pbfm18C7bK https://t.co/zXftSmx1IE

Thursday is African World Heritage Day - an opportunity to celebrate the indispensable tools Africa’s rich & diverse heritage offers us all. 

See how @UNESCO works to preserve & promote the continent’s unique cultural & natural heritage. https://t.co/N5bHDWVSee https://t.co/lk1VYwgdPI

Thursday is Portuguese Language Day!

Follow @NacoesUnidas for updates on the UN's work in Portuguese, a language spoken by 260+ million people around the world. 

More from @UNESCO: https://t.co/dznkzOUlN5 #DiaMundialdaLínguaPortuguesa https://t.co/kJ0rOLi2Oo

Handwashing is one of the most effective ways to prevent the spread of diseases & save lives. 

More from @WHO on Thursday's World #HandHygiene Day: https://t.co/WydQ4IgMos https://t.co/ADBDZkBMSw

Amid global energy crisis & worsening climate emergency, two new UN #ClimateAction initiatives aim to accelerate action towards achieving clean, affordable energy for all & net-zero carbon emissions. https://t.co/WtEDegALCp

Midwives are key to ending preventable maternal & newborn deaths. Yet, the world faces an acute shortage of these essential providers. 

On Thursday's #DayoftheMidwife, see how @UNFPA works to train & support midwives: https://t.co/DRqDb2x1d0 https://t.co/jT60KmU2LY

The war in Ukraine is exacerbating gender inequities, particularly among women facing multiple forms of discrimination. 

Their specific needs must be prioritized in the humanitarian response.

More from @UN_Women & @CAREglobal: https://t.co/JnM9eel3Er

The number of people who have little to no access to sufficient food is growing at an alarming rate, new UN report warns.

#COVID19, the climate crisis & conflict, including the war in Ukraine, are having devastating impacts on global food security. https://t.co/nmtVji0Q9O

On #StarWarsDay and every day, protect our planet we must!

Use the Force to take #ClimateAction.

https://t.co/X0Shwfcd3n

#MayThe4thBeWithYou https://t.co/ANRbLpyTU4

.@UN_Women is committed to supporting the people of Ukraine, especially women & girls who are being impacted by the war.

You can support their efforts: https://t.co/YTlyHCyBIi https://t.co/Erkv7EE2XX

Nearly 200 attacks on health care facilities & health workers in Ukraine have been confirmed by @WHO since the start of the war. 

Health care is #NotATarget. 

Health workers are #NotATarget. https://t.co/uyT5Y41mnt

The climate emergency can seem daunting, but we have the solutions to solve this crisis. 

Share what you are doing to protect the planet by submitting a photo or video of your #ClimateAction here: https://t.co/maSOl18obf #MyClimateAction via @Agora_awards https://t.co/j9NsZML0jb

"Don’t give up on the Sahel."

After meeting with families in Niger affected by the climate crisis, conflict & food insecurity, @antonioguterres warns that their plight threatens not just the region, but the entire world. https://t.co/dRHBnvRtUS

Forests can help the world overcome some of the biggest challenges to humanity, including the climate crisis & biodiversity loss.

Latest from @FAO on what must be done to reduce global deforestation & the growing threat to tropical rainforests. https://t.co/tH2gQEaoss #SOFO2022 https://t.co/guvanzPV5M

Women & girls represent half of the world’s population, yet, no country has achieved gender equality. 

Advancing women's empowerment is critical to achieving the #GlobalGoals: https://t.co/4YRNa2tcvm https://t.co/ldbegIbA3B

Ukraine: More than 100 civilians successfully evacuated from Mariupol.

UN humanitarians providing assistance, including psychosocial support, to evacuees, many of whom spent nearly two months sheltering in steel plant. https://t.co/gtnJ1C3qlk

"Without freedom of the press, there are no real democratic societies. 

Without freedom of the press, there is no freedom."

-- @antonioguterres on Tuesday's #WorldPressFreedomDay. https://t.co/uhu1CUTUnm https://t.co/6EFJ5tXWAP

Save electricity ⚡️ and water. 💧
Reduce, re-use, recycle. ♻
Bike to work. 🚲

Threats against journalists are threats against fundamental freedoms.

Tuesday is #WorldPressFreedomDay

More than 262 million people around the world suffer from asthma, which puts them at increased risk of severe #COVID19. 

@WHO has more 🗝️ facts on Tuesday's #WorldAsthmaDay: https://t.co/fLkGBYqFo2 https://t.co/fdjtT7FO84

More than ever, we need facts & reliable sources of information.

More than ever we need press freedom.

Tuesday is #WorldPressFreedomDay. https://t.co/iRB3CfCgWu https://t.co/sgYc4IdhT3

Racism, xenophobia and intolerance are damaging to all societies. 

But, there are many ways YOU can take action and #FightRacism:

☝️ Call out racism and hate speech
💬 Start conversations
📣 Change the narrative

After water, sand is the world's second most used resource.

⏳ It must be managed wisely & recognised as a strategic resource, not only as a material for construction, but also for its multiple roles in the environment.

At all times.

Everywhere. https://t.co/CbziTUX62s

The difference between 1.5°C and 2°C of global warming can seem marginal. 

But they represent vastly different scenarios for our future. 

Every fraction of a degree matters.

Women & girls in South Sudan are facing increased risk of sexual violence amid ongoing conflict, growing insecurity & climate shocks.

@UNFPA is on the ground providing sexual & reproductive health care and protection & counseling services. https://t.co/F99F5VG9wM https://t.co/uPZEweJ9K6

The overwhelming demand for tuna poses a threat to fish stocks & their surrounding ecosystems.

UN preparing to provide immediate humanitarian support, including psychological services, to civilians evacuated from Mariupol.

Women, children and the elderly are being evacuated after spending nearly two months in damaged steel plant. https://t.co/Fkw4XS9nWW

Ensuring the tuna you eat is sustainably managed can help protect fish stocks & their surrounding ecosystems.
